item.description:
Dear Aussies,

It is my pleasure to invite you to the 2010 Boston Demons Presentation Evening, to be held on Friday 19th November 2010. Please see attached for the official invitation.

2010 has been a great year on and off the field so lets get together to celebrate the achievements both at a team and individual level. Please ensure you rsvp to Rich Fuller by the date provided on the invitation.

The night will be $35 for dinner and attire is suit and tie.

We look forward to seeing you there!

Michael Sheppard.
President-Boston Demons

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Demons Presentation Night
